member.name: T:ConfigurationManager.ConfigurationManager
member.summary: An easy way to let user configure how a plugin behaves without the need to make your own GUI. The user can change any of the settings you expose, even keyboard shortcuts. https://github.com/ManlyMarco/BepInEx.ConfigurationManager

member.summary: GUID of this plugin

member.summary: Version constant

member.summary: Event fired every time the manager window is shown or hidden.

member.summary: Disable the hotkey check used by config manager. If enabled you have to set to show the manager.

member.summary: Is the config manager main window displayed on screen

member.name: M:ConfigurationManager.ConfigurationManager.RegisterCustomSettingDrawer(System.Type,System.Action{ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase})
member.summary: Register a custom setting drawer for a given type. The action is ran in OnGui in a single setting slot. Do not use any Begin / End layout methods, and avoid raising height from standard.

member.name: M:ConfigurationManager.ConfigurationManager.BuildSettingList
member.summary: Rebuild the setting list. Use to update the config manager window if config settings were removed or added while it was open.

member.summary: String currently entered into the search box

member.name: T:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase
member.summary: Class representing all data about a setting collected by ConfigurationManager.

member.summary: List of values this setting can take

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.AcceptableValueRange
member.summary: Range of the values this setting can take

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.ShowRangeAsPercent
member.summary: Should the setting be shown as a percentage (only applies to value range settings)

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.CustomDrawer
member.summary: Custom setting draw action

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.Browsable
member.summary: Show this setting in the settings screen at all? If false, don't show.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.Category
member.summary: Category the setting is under. Null to be directly under the plugin.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.DefaultValue
member.summary: If set, a "Default" button will be shown next to the setting to allow resetting to default.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.HideDefaultButton
member.summary: Force the "Reset" button to not be displayed, even if a valid DefaultValue is available.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.HideSettingName
member.summary: Force the setting name to not be displayed. Should only be used with a to get more space. Can be used together with to gain even more space.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.Description
member.summary: Optional description shown when hovering over the setting

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.DispName
member.summary: Name of the setting

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.PluginInfo
member.summary: Plugin this setting belongs to

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.ReadOnly
member.summary: Only allow showing of the value. False whenever possible by default.

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.SettingType
member.summary: Type of the variable

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.PluginInstance
member.summary: Instance of the plugin that owns this setting

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.IsAdvanced
member.summary: Is this setting advanced

member.name: P:ConfigurationManager.SettingEntryBase.Order
member.summary: Order of the setting on the settings list relative to other settings in a category. 0 by default, lower is higher on the list.

member.summary: Get the value of this setting
